byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: ROME, June 2--A plea for the humanization of the war and for the honorable treatment of civilians in conquered territory was made by the Pope this morning in a speech ......

headline.main: POPE ASKS NATIONS TO HUMANIZE WAR; Pleads for Fair Treatment of Conquered Areas' Civilians and for Just Peace DENIES PARTISAN SPIRIT His 'Paternal Love' Conveyed to Germans and Allies-- Moral Ruin Deplored

lead_paragraph: ROME, June 2--A plea for the humanization of the war and for the honorable treatment of civilians in conquered territory was made by the Pope this morning in a speech ...
